title: Chairman Schiff on Intelligence Community Report on Anomalous Health Incidents
summary: "I appreciate the work of the IC Experts Panel appointed by the DNI and the Deputy Director of CIA to provide scientific and medical perspectives on the potential causes of the health incidents that have afflicted U.S. personnel.
